title: My 14 years old son listens to Lil Peep. Should I worry? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, you shouldn't be worried at all. I'm 17 years old and been listening to Lil Peep since I was 15. Old ass people are going to answer with a big fat, “YES” but you should let your child listen to the music he likes and let him have the freedom to express the music he/she likes. If you restrict him/her from doing so it's just going to make your child despise you. Lil Peep wrote songs on his depression and things that he was going through and suffering. His music helps a lot of people are going through depression or similar situations that Peep was in. I talk with Lil Peep's mother and Gus was an amazing person and an amazing Artist. He was the Kurt Cobain of this era. If your child is doing self-harm then I advise seeking medical attention. Lil Peep's music as nothing to do with your child hurting themselves. They maybe going through their own problems which resulted in them cutting.

No - is that any different than I wanna be yo dog by the stooges or Needle n Spoon Savoy Brown - from the 60s - they burned Beatles and said we were goin to hell if we listened to them- instead of worry / discuss show him other music tell him music is so vast look beyond what he runnin with friends then sit and listen with him to God’s Plan - Drake Music does not cause mental retardation - our f-Ed up educational system and Christianity cause it a thousand times more than rap !!! Ima jazz piano player my kids all listened to that stuff now they don’t (as much) and they are grown n successful !!! Actually I’m in my 6Os and love lil peep - he just didn’t make it and that’s sad- show him peeps last vid before he died and ask him - u wanna be that guy?
